languages.text: {n}Судьбы сплетаются узлом — хрупкие по отдельности, но могучие вместе. Не всем суждено дойти до конца, но никто не будет забыт.{/n}
{n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судьбы сплетаются узлом — хрупкие по отдельности, но могучие вместе. Не всем суждено дойти до конца, но никто не будет забыт.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The fates twist together into a braid, fragile on their own yet mighty in unity. Not all are destined to see the voyage through to its end, but none will be forgotten.{/n}
{n}The fates twist together into a braid, fragile on their own yet mighty in unity. Not all are destined to see the voyage through to its end, but none will be forgotten.{/n}
{n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}
{n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}
{n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les fils du destin, si fragiles qu'ils soient, se renforcent lorsqu'on les noue les uns aux autres. Il ne sera pas donné à tout le monde de voir l'issue de ce voyage, mais personne ne sera oublié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les fils du destin, si fragiles qu'ils soient, se renforcent lorsqu'on les noue les uns aux autres. Il ne sera pas donné à tout le monde de voir l'issue de ce voyage, mais personne ne sera oublié.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los hilos del destino son frágiles, pero al entretejerlos se vuelven fuertes. No todos están destinados para ver el final de este viaje, pero nadie caerá en el olvido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los hilos del destino son frágiles, pero al entretejerlos se vuelven fuertes. No todos están destinados para ver el final de este viaje, pero nadie caerá en el olvido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管命运的细丝脆弱不堪，但只要交织在一起，就会变得无比坚韧。尽管并非所有人都能亲眼见证这场旅途的终点，但每个人都会被铭记于心。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管命运的细丝脆弱不堪，但只要交织在一起，就会变得无比坚韧。尽管并非所有人都能亲眼见证这场旅途的终点，但每个人都会被铭记于心。{/n}

languages.text: {n}運命の糸はもろく、しかし織り合わされば強い。誰もがこの航海を最後まで見届ける運命にあるわけではないが、誰も忘れ去られることはない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}運命の糸はもろく、しかし織り合わされば強い。誰もがこの航海を最後まで見届ける運命にあるわけではないが、誰も忘れ去られることはない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Fäden des Schicksals sind dünn, doch werden sie zusammengewoben, so sind sie stark. Nicht alle sind dazu bestimmt, diese Reise bis zum Ende zu begleiten, doch niemand wird vergessen werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strands of fate are fragile — yet woven together, they are strong. Not everyone is destined to see this voyage through to its end, but no one will be forgotten.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Fäden des Schicksals sind dünn, doch werden sie zusammengewoben, so sind sie stark. Nicht alle sind dazu bestimmt, diese Reise bis zum Ende zu begleiten, doch niemand wird vergessen werden.{/n}
